title: Explicit videos of Belgian footballers emerge on social media
text:
A Belgian football club has been embroiled in a sex scandal after footage emerged of several of its players having sex with a naked woman.

Explicit videos which have circulated on social media show the woman crawling naked on the floor of a club cafeteria and one of the players having sex with her on a massage bench.

It is claimed that one of the players at amateur club Espoir Minerois took the video after a training session last month.

One of the videos was filmed in the club bar, showing the naked woman sitting on a stool with players around her.

The woman could be seen in a video posted on social media crawling across the floor (left) and (right) standing naked in the club bar

The woman's mother said her daughter was 'not in a normal state' when a video of her crawling naked across the floor of the dressing room was taken

She could then be seen in a second clip in the dressing room crawling on all fours as players watched on, according to local media.

The players are now facing a judicial probe and the woman's mother has suggested she may have been under the influence of drugs or alcohol.

'There is evidence that my daughter was not in a normal state,' her mother told Sudinfo.

'I want this to go through the court to make it clear. But I think there is more than they want to say.'

One of the players admitted to Belgian media that things had gone 'too far' but said the woman had consented.

It is not clear if the woman consented, as Belgian media has reported she may have been under the influence of drugs or alcohol.

Club officials at the Belgian Provincial league club said sanctions have been imposed on some players with one athlete reportedly banned for a month as a result of videos filmed at the club

Authorities in Belgium launched a criminal probe into the incident after the woman and her family filed a lawsuit.

One club official told La Meuse that they had only heard about the video when a parent of one of the club's youth players told them about it.

'At this point we only know that several players were there, but we don't know exactly what happened,' the official said.

'We will get to the bottom of this story, which is already taking on a dramatic scale.'

The club, which plays in the Provincial league in the Liege district, has already imposed sanctions on some of the players, according to Grenz Echo.

One player was reportedly banned for a month while another was forced to train with the second XI.

President Joseph Gaillard said in a statement on the 's website: 'So far we only know that some players were present, but we do not know exactly what happened.

'We're going to get to the bottom of the whole story, which is currently reaching enormous proportions.'
description: Explicit videos which have circulated on social media show a woman crawling naked on the floor of a Belgian football club's cafeteria and one of the players having sex with her on a massage bench.
